title: NCAA BYU Cougars Boy's Fleece Gloves
description: Protect you and your hands from the elements while showing your love for your Cougars with your new Fleece Gloves. You know how comfy your favorite go to Fleece Sweatshirt feels? Now it is time to share some love with your poor, cracked, chapped, cold hands. These superior, long lasting, NCAA officially licensed, Fleece Gloves are available in different colors. One size fits most. Check out the bold embroidered BYU logo on the back of each hand. The ideal gift for anyone. Everyone needs and can use these Fleece Gloves.
details: {"Package Dimensions": "9.5 x 4.5 x 0.6 inches; 0.35 Ounces", "Item model number": "52345", "Department": "boys", "Date First Available": "December 10, 2013", "Manufacturer": "donegal bay licensed sporting goods"}
